abstract: A former banker has sued JPMorgan Chase, claiming that she was fired after alerting superiors to possibly questionable dealings by a top client.
snippet: A former banker has sued JPMorgan Chase, claiming that she was fired after alerting superiors to possibly questionable dealings by a top client.
lead_paragraph: A former private banker at JPMorgan Chase & Company has sued the bank, claiming that she was fired after alerting superiors to possibly questionable dealings by a top client.

headline.main: Banker’s Suit Says She Was Fired for Questioning Account
headline.print_headline: Banker’s Suit Says She Was Fired for Questioning Account
